colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,('DI LA RLUNG DANG GLUNG ZHES PA GNYIS @019B YOD PA DON 'DRA BA'AM, ,GANG LTAR YANG SNGA MO'I YI GE LTAR BYA TE, MCHOG GSUM SPYI LA MCHOD PA'I SGO NAS RLUNG RTA DAR BAR BYED PA'I CHO GA 'DI NI CHEN PO HOR YUL GYI GRVA RIGS BLO BZANG LUNG RTOGS DANG BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL GNYIS KYIS RLUNG RTA'I BSKANG BSHAGS CIG GYIS CES DNGOS PO'I SKYES DANG BCAS YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I MOS NGOR, ^ BTZUN GZUGS NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS RANG LO NYER BRGYAD LA BABS @020A *, ,PA'I NAG ZLA'I YAR TSES BZANG POR CHOS SDE CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RANG GSHAG NAS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG BSAM 'GRUB MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA MANGGA LAm, ,)
